title: Microplastics contamination in the most popular brands of Iranian sausages and evaluation of its human exposure
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Meghdad Pirsaheb, Monireh Nouri, Tooraj Massahi, Pouran Makhdoumi, Negin Azadi Baban, Hooshyar Hossini
